message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, this product is a premium item, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $10500. It's a fair price considering its value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm fairly compensated for the value it brings. I can offer it to you for $11000. It's a great deal, considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I understand the value you're placing on the product, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $10200 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I can offer it to you for $11500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering its value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11000 again, but I need to make it clear that this is my final concession. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. I can offer it to you for $11000.
I understand that this is your final concession, Alice, but I'm still trying to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $10800 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
